title: Interpretation of seeing black pigeons being slaughtered in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering black pigeons in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Slaughtering birds in a dream is one of the dreams that frighten some people, especially if they are not accustomed to raising and slaughtering birds. In other cases, it warns of sins, the presence of problems, and the pioneer who commits some sins. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of slaughtering black pigeons in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dove in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a dove in a dream is a vision. It brings a lot of goodness and life to its owner. Ibn Sirin explains that whoever dreams of trying to catch a pigeon by throwing stones at it, this is evidence of the priest’s corruption and his cursing of women, which is known as slandering and punishing chaste women. Hard on God. As for seeing pigeons being slaughtered in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer’s wedding date is approaching, God willing. If one marries a dove in a dream, this is evidence that one will have a child, and the dreamer must be sure that the interpretations are only human understanding and that only God knows the unseen and appreciates what is within. Arrays Seeing a dove in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer will receive. Some scholars unanimously agreed that the value of a dove is one hundred dirhams or more, and according to the number that the dreamer found in his dream, he calculates the money that he will obtain, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black dove in a dream: Seeing a black dove is not good at all, as seeing a black dove in a dream indicates Wars and conflicts, and the dreamer will hear a lot of sad and disturbing news, and black doves can be a sign of problems that lead to separation and divorce, God does that. But if the dreamer finds in his dream that a black dove is flying over his head, this is a sign of the death of someone dear to him. The dreamer's heart. In the event that a black dove enters the fortuneteller's bed, this is a warning that his word is near, God forbid, and he must pray and nothing can change fate except supplication. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dove slaughtered in a dream. Scholars and translators differed in the interpretation of seeing a dove slaughtered in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black dove being slaughtered in a dream. The slaughter of a black dove in a dream indicates the hypocrisy and hypocrisy that the dreamer suffers from if he is the one slaughtering the pigeons. The black dove in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is surrounded by some false friends who have deceived him. The black dove’s house indicates the calamity that befell the dreamer’s life and he suffers from it for a period. As for the meat of black pigeons, it is a sign of disobedience and sin against the priest, and as for the eggs of black pigeons, it is food from forbidden or immoral money, and the sound of the cooing of black pigeons is a harbinger. Despair. The sadness that befalls the dreamer and seeing black pigeon feathers could be a sign of betrayal by a husband, friends, or family, and imprisoning a black pigeon is an indication of the viewer’s imprisonment or captivity. As for the gray dove, which some may confuse with the black dove, it is a sign of a large diet that will occur. It is seen, or it could be a sign of the birth of a boy to a pregnant woman or marriage. For an unmarried girl

title: Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream

preview.html: Rabbits are pets that many people grow because of their special taste that many love, in addition to the high nutritional value found in rabbit meat, and we will explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about clay in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream for a married woman. Dream interpreters argue that the rabbits that appear in a dream for a married woman It indicates that she will give birth to many males and females will have many offspring. Some interpreters say that a woman who catches a rabbit in a dream is a woman who speaks ill of her husband in front of others, or it could be a woman who is cheating on her husband. If the owner of the dream desires to have children, Seeing rabbits in a dream portends that she will have good offspring, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about funeral prayer in a dream. A rabbit in a dream for a man. Dream interpreters believe that many gray rabbits in a man’s dream indicate the calm and psychological stability that this man enjoys. If the dreamer has the opportunity to travel, Seeing rabbits in his dream may mean that he will suffer from fatigue and exhaustion on this trip and may face many difficulties. Imam Al-Sadiq says that a man who raises rabbits in his house shows that he is married to an honorable woman. A man is suffering from many marital disputes, and raising rabbits in a dream It portends the end of these problems and their solution in the near future. If a married man sees himself slaughtering a rabbit, he will divorce his wife. Interpretation of a dream about restrictions in a dream. A rabbit bite in a dream. A rabbit bite in a dream indicates that the owner of this vision will face many challenges and difficulties in his field of work. A bite indicates A rabbit also indicates that the dreamer will suffer from some health problems or contract a disease. Some see a rabbit bite as a warning to the dreamer who is committing sins to stop doing so and return to God. A rabbit bite in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enter into a dispute with his family and relatives. Interpretation of a dream about a towel in a dream. Kill a rabbit in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees herself slaughtering a rabbit, she will marry a man who has made great efforts to reach her. Slaughtering rabbits also indicates the dreamer’s success in obtaining a lot of halal money without any effort or hardship. Slaughtering a rabbit in the dream of an unmarried young man indicates that he will marry a good virgin girl in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about tahini in a dream. Seeing a rabbit in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is buying a lot of rabbits, this woman will save a lot of money and will enter into many projects. Profitable future. Rabbits that appear in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate that the time of childbirth is approaching, and if this woman plays with them, she can give birth naturally. But if the husband gives the woman rabbits, then its interpretation in this case is that this woman will give birth to the type of boy she wants. Interpretation of seeing a king in a dream. Seeing a rabbit in a dream for a young man. Ibn Shaheen says that chasing a rabbit for a man in a dream indicates a great competition between him and someone close to him. A single man kissing a rabbit indicates the presence of an ill-behaved and trustworthy girl in his life. Yeshi

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a married woman: A woman often cares about her hair and works to maintain it, as it is a woman’s crown and the basis of her beauty and charm among her peers. It also helps improve her psychological state. In this context, we comment on the interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair and the killers of a married woman. Lice is considered one of the diseases that women suffer from, especially those who have long hair and who take care of it and always try to maintain it. In this context, we comment on the interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for a woman. Married woman: If a married woman sees that there are a lot of lice in her hair and killing them in a dream, then she faces her marital and family problems and confronts them fully, and plans for a pure life without worry, and God will help her in this matter. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream about her husband who was removing lice from his head and she killed him. Then he committed a sin or a great sin in his life, so he repents for it and will not commit any more sins while he is awake. Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for a married woman. A married woman killed a yellow lice and removed it from her hair in a dream, and this is a sign of victory over envious enemies in reality. See also: Interpretation Dreams about extracting lice from the hair for a married, pregnant, and single woman. Interpretation of a dream about black lice in the hair for a married woman. A married woman takes care of herself and her hair and tries to preserve her beauty so that her husband does not have the opportunity to look at others in this context. We attach the interpretation of a dream about black lice in a married woman’s hair: Seeing black lice in a dream is interpreted as fear that someone will try to harm this woman. Black lice are considered a symbol of a woman’s problems and anxiety, as well as a feeling of loneliness and the inability to find someone else. As Seeing black lice in a married woman’s dream indicates a mysterious secret or bad news that the girl will be exposed to during a certain period. Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for a married woman: Lice symbolize a feeling of inferiority and the feeling that one is not good enough for anyone else. Also, black lice In a dream, it is a sign of stress. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a married and pregnant woman. There are many insects that can infect and harm humans, and lice are among those annoying and problem-causing insects. In this context, we attach the interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for married women and pregnant women: For married couples Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for a married woman A married woman saw in a dream infected with lice and was suffering from some diseases or that she had lost many of her favorite things during that period. Likewise, if the married woman was suffering from Lack of livelihood and bad circumstances within her, and she did not have children, then this indicates that God, Blessed and Almighty, provides her with abundant money and good offspring at the same time. If a married woman sees lice coming out of her head, this indicates the many sins that she committed during this period, and she must To repent and return to the path of righteousness and guidance. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing lice in the hair in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of a dream when you see a wall in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing a wall in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wall in a dream for married women, pregnant women, and single girls. Seeing a wall in a dream indicates the presence of a responsible person in reality, such as a father, husband, or brother, and seeing him climbing the wall means success, experience, and the fulfillment of desires. And the interpretation of a dream about seeing a wall in a dream, a white wall in a dream, to see a falling wall, an interpretation of seeing graffiti, to see a dream about a dirty wall, a wall is a wall or a fence that has a certain length and width that we see in our dream, and today we show you what is described in this article, interpretation Dreaming about a wall in a dream for a married, pregnant, and single woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wall by Ibn Sirin. Dreaming about seeing a wall in a dream, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, indicates a responsible person and a strong personality. Seeing a wall collapsing in a dream is a sign of failure and victory of enemies over the dreamer. Seeing it while Cleaning a wall in a dream means that the dreamer is close to an important person. Hitting a wall with a hammer in a dream and falling is evidence of abandonment of work and work. A dream of seeing a wall cracking in a dream means the death of pride, honor and dignity. The interpretation of a dream about a solid, strong wall in a dream is evidence of respect, strength, prestige and influence for those around him. Seeing her stuck in a wall in a dream indicates that the dreamer adheres to his religion, morals, and principles. The interpretation of seeing a wall on which a person’s picture is painted in a dream indicates the death of the person drawn. Dreaming of a hole in a wall in a dream is a sign of a bad mental state and illness. Seeing a wall in a dream It indicates human life. If he sees that he is building a wall, this indicates the foundation of his life, building it and achieving his desires in life. Seeing a broken wall is not a good thing, as it indicates lost dreams, failure, illness, death, problems and disagreements, the breakup of relationships, quarrels and enmity. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wall for a woman Single. Interpretation of seeing a girl climbing a wall in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of her desires and dreams. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a wall in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of success at work and excellence in studies. Seeing an unmarried girl’s wall as if someone is building a wall in a dream is a sign of her marriage. The future. Seeing a falling wall in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the failure of her relationship with the person she loves. A dream about an old wall in a girl’s dream indicates her late marriage and failure in her work. Seeing a leaning wall in a girl’s dream indicates the bad psychological state she is going through. Interpretation of the dream indicates The collapse of a wall in a girl’s dream indicates bad news or that something bad will happen to her. If you see a wall or a wall in a girl’s dream, this indicates family problems, a lack of understanding, and a break in friendship. To see a high wall or a wall in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she has achieved A high position, whether in the scientific field or in her field of work, and she has reached the highest ranks, as the vision may indicate high morals and correct behavior. Seeing a white wall indicates a bright future and the fulfillment of dreams and...

title: Interpretation of a dream about blindness for someone close

preview.html: Also, according to the psychological state that the dreamer is experiencing, based on all these signs, we can distinguish whether the dream is good or bad, because some believe that blindness is an absolute bad thing or something that carries unwanted connotations. Interpretation of a dream about blindness for someone close to someone’s life Full of changes and events that occur in a person’s life. They can be events between good and evil. These events are usually stuck in the person’s mind and affect his dreams. Below we present the interpretation of a dream about blindness for someone. Close: Dream interpretation scholars usually interpret blindness in a dream as meaning that the dreamer does Something that violates the law. It usually refers to illicit money, and this dream indicates the need to get rid of this sin. Or illicit money to increase his sins in the afterlife. Blindness in the dream also indicates that the dreamer is far from his religion, especially the Holy Qur’an and the teachings of the Most High Sharia. It indicates This dream indicates that the dreamer's end will be bad because he did not fear God in many matters in his life. A close person whom you know is married blind indicates that the person is going through a very difficult time. This period will affect his current and future life. If the person dreams that another person He suffers in reality from a certain disease. He became blind in the dream, so this indicates that this person is suffering from severe pain as a result of his illness in reality. See also: Interpretation of a dream about another person’s infected eye. Interpretation of a dream of returning sight in a dream. Sometimes a person can dream Someone else, and the dream of returning sight is considered one of the most common and praiseworthy dreams. Therefore, we present to you the following interpretation of the dream of Basra returning again to someone close to you in a dream: Seeing someone close to you blind in the dream, whether it is family or friends. After that his sight is restored again, and in this case the dream is good news and glad tidings, God willing. Because it Being pregnant means that the life of the person who has his sight restored will develop for the better in the coming days. If he is suffering from extreme poverty, his life will improve and he will become richer and better. The return of sight in a dream indicates that the dreamer or the person to whom his sight was restored will spread great joy in his home. This joy may take the form of marriage, saving money, or expecting a child. Seeing the person close to him suffering from deteriorating health and being blind. Then returning the gaze to him indicates that God Almighty will reward him for his satisfaction and obedience. This reward could be the removal of Sadness, which is illness. To see a life partner blind in a dream and then his sight returns to him again, this indicates what is not good. This is because it indicates that the dreamer will experience separation from the person he is attached to. Interpretation of a dream of blindness A dream of blindness can sometimes indicate something positive Other times it can indicate something negative and seeing blindness can sometimes be unexplainable. We present below the interpretation of a dream about blindness in detail: The reason for seeing a blind relative in a dream could be a feeling of anxiety and extreme turmoil about the future and what it holds for this person. Seeing a blind relative in a dream whose eyes turn

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating dates for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating dates for single, married and pregnant women, and seeing a date in a dream in general is a vision that has a positive impact on a person's life, because dates are generally beneficial to humans, so what about a person who dreamed that he was eating dates and perhaps saw two companions of dates in front of him, we will know through our article all the details related to the interpretation of a dream about eating dates for a single woman, all the details and indications that the dream can include a single or married girl and others. A date gift in a dream for a single woman If a girl sees someone giving her anything without exception, she is happy with that, so what about a date gift in a dream, we will learn about the consequences of that as follows: / If a girl sees that she has received a gift represented by an amount of dates, this may be that she is on a date with the approach of her wedding. If you see a date gift in a dream, this means that this girl is superior in her practical life and is doing everything in her power to achieve her goals and rise to a higher position. If the person who saw this in his dream is still a student or a teacher, this means that he will excel and get higher grades. Interpretation scholars say that dates reflect the extent of the girl's interest In her life, perhaps she is interested in the cultural field through which she seeks to build herself and her personality. Interpretation of a dream about eating a date in a dream for a single girl The dream of eating dates is one of the things that benefits its owner. If a person eats a date in his dream, what is the meaning of this dream, we will discover in the following lines: / Ibn Sirin says: If a girl sees that she has eaten in her dream, this is good for seeing blessings, health and food. It was also mentioned that dates are a cure for the sick, meaning that if the sick woman sees that she has eaten dates in her dream, this indicates that the date of her recovery from what she was suffering from is approaching. If the girl who dreamed of it is a student, this indicates that she will excel and succeed in her academic life. Just as dating is generally good in the dream of a single girl because it is a path for her to goodness and that God will grant her health and blessings. If an unmarried girl sees that she has eaten dry dates, this is evidence of her exemption from what she suffers from. If a girl sees in her dream that there is a small palm tree full of fruit, this is evidence that the girl is fair and its purity testifies to her good reputation among people. However, if she sees the tree damaged and polluted This indicates that she is a girl who does not follow her religion and commits sins. If a girl sees that a man gives her a date, this means that she will benefit from the person she saw. If a stranger gives her a date, this is a sign that her engagement is approaching. If a girl sees in her dream that she is distributing dates to people passing by, this is evidence that she gives a lot of charity to people. If she sees herself buying dates, this indicates that she is striving to achieve something she wants to achieve. See more: Interpretation of a dream about many dates by Ibn Sirin for a married woman A gift of a date in a dream for a single woman Interpretation scholars have provided many interpretations about the dream of dates, so we will learn in this article

title: Interpretation of carrying something in a dream The meaning of carrying weights in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a porter or carrying someone carrying me on his back in my hand, carrying something heavy, lifting weights for an unmarried girl, married woman, pregnant woman, divorced woman, and more according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Imam Abdullah. Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi The person’s weight If the person’s weight in the dream is heavy, this indicates his bad neighbor. Heavy burden can be sins. A woman's heavy burden means a rope or a bad husband. And whoever dreams that he is carrying a heavy load, then it is bad that it will come from his bad neighbor. The burden on the neck or shoulder is guilty. Carrying a newborn is comfortable for the pregnant woman, and sad and tiring for the pregnant woman. Whoever sees that he is carrying firewood, then he is carrying gossip and spreading lies. If he sees that he is carrying a corpse, hitting is forbidden. What is Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a porter in a dream? A porter is one who sees that he is carrying a heavy load and hits it with the force of that load. The porter carries the evil of people and satisfies his needs, and he has his own worries. The Burden If the burden is removed from humans and animals in a dream, this means charity and kindness to those who know and those who do not know. Seeing a porter in a dream portends bad luck and important events. If you see yourself as a porter, it means that you are humble and come from a simple background. If you hire a porter, you will be happy and you will rejoice in your success. And whoever sees: that his burden is light and it is his own, then it shows the weight of goodness, benefit and comfort, and if it is heavy then it shows an abundance of sins, as the Almighty says “to bear their burdens in.” Full on the Day of Resurrection. Whoever dreams that he moves to someone else for rent, this indicates the emergence of sadness and worry, and if it is not for rent, then it indicates his benevolence to others. If you dream that you are carrying a heavy burden, this indicates a long life full of love and good deeds. If you fall under A heavy burden, this indicates your inability to obtain the necessary comforts for those who look to you for a living. If you see others in this place, this indicates experiences related to them that will interest you. Seeing a heavy burden in a dream - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about losing a mobile phone by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about losing a mobile phone: The dreamer losing his mobile phone is one of the things that disturbs him greatly in his vision and makes him fear his phone in reality because he expects to lose it in reality and exposes him to many problems because of that. You see that you lose your cell phone in a dream, you should follow us to understand the interpretations of the dream.Dream Interpretation of Losing a Cell PhoneLosing a cell phone in a dream has different interpretations. If one loses it and cannot recover it, the meaning will be difficult, because it indicates a feeling of extreme despair with a shock to one's emotional or social relationship, and losing a phone can be explained by a lot of bad news. If the phone is lost and then found, it gives you good news about Beautiful things with different circumstances you go through. The dream shows that you are moving away from conflict and reaching a calm period of emotional relationship, and if you are threatened with losing your job, you will benefit from it or settle down again. Interpretation of a dream about losing a mobile phone by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains that losing a mobile phone in a dream is evidence of being subjected to the theft of some valuable things Which is in a person’s possession and he may lose it and it is not stolen, except for some other predictions from him, which say that he may lose his good relationship with a friend or relative. Losing a phone in the vision threatens the dreamer with difficult things and events that he will have to face soon, such as separation from his job and the sadness that befalls him after This is for loss of income and livelihood, but if he searches for the phone and finds it, he will return to you what you lost or lost for a period of time. The online dream interpretation website is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Interpretation of Dreams Online in Google and get the correct interpretations. Losing a cell phone in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi said that seeing a cell phone lost in a dream is one of the disturbing dreams that indicates the appearance of many undesirable things in the life of the dreamer, which will be the reason for changing the course of the dream. Whole life. His life is for the worse, but he must be patient and calm and ask God for help often so that he can overcome everything as quickly as possible. Researcher Al-Osaimi also confirmed that if the dreamer sees his mobile phone lost in his dream, this is a sign that he has received a lot of bad news about His career, which will be the reason he feels like despair. And severe frustration, which may be the reason for him entering the stage of severe depression in the following days. The researcher Al-Osaimi explained that seeing the mobile phone lost while the fortuneteller is sleeping indicates that he is facing many obstacles and great difficulties that hinder him and make him unable to reach what he desires and desires during this period of His life. Stealing a mobile phone in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that they are exposed to many major crises and problems that exceed their ability to withstand and that always leave them in a state of psychological tension.
